As-[93mgrown[0m [93mmicro[0m [93mcrystals[0m of [93mBAs[0m are [93mreported[0m to be [93munintentionally[0m [93mp[0m-[93mtype[0m. [93mHere[0m, the [93mevidence[0m of [93minhomogeneous[0m [93mn[0m-[93mtype[0m [93mbehavior[0m in [93mBAs[0m [93mcrystals[0m [93mgrown[0m by an [93mimproved[0m [93mgrowth[0m [93mprocess[0m [93mreducing[0m the [93mimpurities[0m is [93mpresent[0m. [93mLocal[0m [93mn[0m-[93mtype[0m [93mdoping[0m is [93mconfirmed[0m by [93mfour[0m [93mmethods[0m: [93mcurrent[0m-[93mvoltage[0m [93mmeasurement[0m, [93mscanning[0m [93mphotocurrent[0m [93mmicroscopy[0m, [93mKelvin[0m [95mProbe[0m [93mForce[0m [93mMicroscopy[0m, and [93mHall[0m [93meffect[0m. [93mTheir[0m [93manalysis[0m [93menables[0m the [93mformulation[0m of a [92mmodel[0m [93mdescribing[0m [93mBAs[0m [93mband[0m [93mbending[0m on [93mcontacts[0m and [93mbias[0m. [93mAnalysis[0m of [93mscanning[0m [93mphotocurrent[0m [93mmicroscopy[0m [93mreveals[0m that the [93mdiffusion[0m [93mlength[0m of [93mminority[0m [93mcarriers[0m in [93mBAs[0m is [93msubstantial[0m, [93mreaching[0m [93m33[0m [93mµm[0m. [93mDefect[0m [93manalysis[0m [93mperformed[0m by [93mcurrent[0m [93mtransient[0m [93mspectroscopy[0m, [93mphoto[0m-[93minduced[0m [93mcurrent[0m [93mtransient[0m [93mspectroscopy[0m and [93mX[0m-[93mray[0m [93mphotoelectron[0m [93mspectroscopy[0m [93mshows[0m that [93msilicon[0m-[93msubstituted[0m [93mboron[0m is a [93mcandidate[0m for a [93mdonor[0m in [93mBAs[0m. [93mPresented[0m [93mresults[0m [93mshow[0m the [93mperspective[0m for [93mbipolar[0m [93mcontrol[0m of [93mcharge[0m [93mcarrier[0m [93mtype[0m in [93mBAs[0m and [93mconsequently[0m its [93mapplication[0m in [93mbetter[0m [93mthermally[0m [93mmanaged[0m [93mmicroelectronics[0m.
